title: ice: unreachable expr.rs

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

labels.name: regression-from-stable-to-stable
labels.description: Performance or correctness regression from one stable version to another.

body:
### Code ```Rust macro_rules! sink { ($abi:literal) => { extern $abi extern $abi fn _export type _PTR = extern $abi fn; } } fn main() { let _ = sink!("Foo"__); } ``` ### Meta `rustc --version --verbose`: ``` rustc 1.72.0-nightly (371994e0d 2023-06-13) binary: rustc commit-hash: 371994e0d8380600ddda78ca1be937c7fb179b49 commit-date: 2023-06-13 host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu release: 1.72.0-nightly LLVM version: 16.0.5 ``` ### Error output ``` - ```
Backtrace
